exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : nat -> R H_ev : eventually (fun n : nat => u n <= v n) H_lim_u : is_lim_seq u p_infty Unable to unify "match ?M2366 with | p_infty => True | _ => False end" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally p_infty P -> filtermap v eventually P".
The reference H_ev was not found in the current environment.

In environment H : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l1 l2 : Rbar), eventually (fun n : nat => u n <= v n) -> is_lim_seq u l1 -> is_lim_seq v l2 -> Rbar_le l1 l2 r : Rbar u, v : nat -> R H_lim_u : is_lim_seq u p_infty x : nat H0 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n <= v n Unable to unify "is_lim_seq u p_infty" with "filterlim (fun n : nat => n) eventually eventually".

In environment H : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l1 l2 : Rbar), eventually (fun n : nat => u n <= v n) -> is_lim_seq u l1 -> is_lim_seq v l2 -> Rbar_le l1 l2 r : Rbar u, v : nat -> R H_lim_u : is_lim_seq u p_infty x : nat H0 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n <= v n Unable to unify "(is_lim_seq ?M3290 p_infty -> cv_infty ?M3290) /\\ (cv_infty ?M3290 -> is_lim_seq ?M3290 p_infty)" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally r P -> filtermap v eventually P".

In environment H2 : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l1 l2 : Rbar), eventually (fun n : nat => u n <= v n) -> is_lim_seq u l1 -> is_lim_seq v l2 -> Rbar_le l1 l2 r0, r : Rbar u, v : nat -> R H_lim_u : is_lim_seq u p_infty x : nat H0 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n <= v n H : forall u : nat -> R, cv_infty u -> is_lim_seq u r0 H1 : forall u : nat -> R, is_lim_seq u r0 -> cv_infty u Unable to unify "is_lim_seq u p_infty" with "is_lim_seq v r".

original: intros H_ev H_lim_u. apply is_lim_seq_le_loc with (l1 := p_infty). - apply H_ev. - apply H_lim_u. - apply is_lim_seq_p_infty_Reals. apply H_lim_u.
